title.rendered: Dahua PTZ1C200UE-GN 2MP Starlight IR PTZ Network Camera

content.rendered:
Technical Speciﬁcation Camera
Image Sensor 1/2.8″ STARVIS™ CMOS
Max. Resolution 2MP
Effective Pixels 1920 (H) × 1080 (V)
ROM 128MB
RAM 256MB
Electronic Shutter Speed 1/3–1/30000s
Minimum Illumination
Color: 0.005Lux@F2.0 B/W: 0.0005Lux@F2.0 0 Lux (IR light on)
IR Distance 20m (65.6ft)
IR On/Off Control Manual/SmartIR
IR LED Number 1
Lens
Focal Length 3.6mm
Aperture F2.0
Field of View H: 84.22°; V: 45.8°
Close Focus Distance 0.9m
Iris Control Fixed Iris
DORI Distance
Detect Observe Recognize Identify

Advanced Intelligence Face Detection; Heat Map

Video Frame Rate
Main Stream: 1080P/1.3M/720P(1–25/30fps) Sub Stream 1: D1/CIF(1–25/30fps) Sub Stream 2: 720P/D1/CIF(1–25/30fps)

Day/Night ICR
BLC Support
WDR 120dB

Motion Detection Support

Electronic Image Stabilization Support

Digital Zoom 16x

Ethernet Port 1 RJ-45 Port 10/100Base-T
